topic.title: Couchbase Server administrators
topic.shortdesc: There are two types of Couchbase Server administrative users: Couchbase administrators and LDAP administrators.

body.section:
Couchbase administrators There are two types of Couchbase administrators:
Full administrators These administrators are configured during installation and have full access to all Couchbase Server functions.
Read-only administrators Privileges and credentials for these administrators can be set at any time using the Couchbase Web Console. A read-only administrator can view certain activities without having ability to edit.
Passwords for the read-only administrators follow the same requirements as for other Couchbase Server passwords: they must be strong and rotated periodically.
To set up credentials for a read-only administrator using the Couchbase Web Console, go to Settings Account Management and enter the administrator's username and password.
LDAP administrators LDAP is also administered by either full or read-only administrators. To set up LDAP administrators, see .
